Room.Name: Wall Road West
Room.ShortDescription: Wall Road West continues to the north and south.
Room.LongDescription: There is a very old but well kept mansion on the east side of the road. It belongs to squire Frebineb, the commander of the Brownhaven militia. A wide path leads east to the carriage house on the estate. On the west side you see the high wall that surrounds the village.
